website_summaries.verdict: This is a versatile live center/accessory set that includes a stepped cone.
cons: they may not turn as well as expected

customer_reviews.title: Bearings get hot
customer_reviews.text: The design and versatility of this live center is pretty good but the bearings in mine get hot really fast. I'll use it for a few minutes under a light load and it heats up. I went back to the Powermatic live center that came with my lathe and it doesnt have that problem...maybe I got one with a bad bearing that is out of tolerance and has some excessive friction. The versatility is great and I like it, just hope it holds up
customer_reviews.author: Joseph M. Cone

customer_reviews.title: Check the bearing when you get it.
customer_reviews.text: The first one I received had a lot of sideways slop in the bearing; and looked used. Amazon replaced it promptly. The second one looks new, the bearing is secure. I haven't used it much yet, but the versatility looks excellent. But there is not a small cup for self-centering dowels or stubs less than 1" diameter.
customer_reviews.author: M. Luce

customer_reviews.title: Also the bearings are either crappy or too tight or something
customer_reviews.text: I have the same problem it seems a lot of other people do. For one, when i opened the box the parts where scattered everywhere and scratched. Also the bearings are either crappy or too tight or something? It doesn't turn nearly as easily as my other center. If I had it to do again, I would probably buy a different set.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Wood

customer_reviews.title: Correcting a Mistake with a previous review
customer_reviews.text: It was not missing parts as in my first review. I found the missing part stuck in the foam. I got the other part separated with a punch and hammer. So now everything is as it should be and I am sorry for my quick response. This is a nice set.
customer_reviews.author: terry

customer_reviews.title: works fine on Central Machinery 18" lathe
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my Central MAchinery 18" lathe I bought at H/Freight. My main purpose was for long hole boring. I've bored one hole so far, and no issues at all. Haven't yet used any of the other features...but the videos on youtube are super for showing how versatile it is.
customer_reviews.author: celticpiping

customer_reviews.title: What more could you need from a live center?
customer_reviews.text: I couldn’t be more satisfied, it may be a slight step down in perceived quality from the one-way or robust, but for 75% of the price you get a very nice live center with more options than any other brand offers. It is yet another Teknatools/Nova product that I am very happy with.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Not what is pictured,
customer_reviews.text: I have not used it yet but I have cleaned all the packing grease off the parts that came scattered around the inside of the box, not very well packaged. As stated in other reviews it does not look like the picture, all parts have a black finish, no polished steel parts. The knockout bar supplied does fit the NOVA LIVE CENTRE BODY, but nothing is supplied to knockout hollow cup center point out of the hollow cup centre, I used a piece of 5/16" bar steel I had. I will try and update after I have used it.
customer_reviews.author: Robert & Linda Higgins

customer_reviews.title: Good Starter
customer_reviews.text: I feel lucky to have found this (on Amazon). I have bought several 2MT live tail centers, and was about to buy 2 more. This looked like it would replace those purchases, and it does that and more. Triple ball bearings will outlast all of my others anyway. The quality is fine, and all metal. The individual center adapters are also 2MT and can be used straight in the tail stock. I think before buying an aftermarket live center this system deserves strong consideration.
customer_reviews.author: Camera Bug

customer_reviews.title: Very handy

customer_reviews.text: This is a great addition to my lathe. The additional tips make it very versital. My only complaint is that some of the pieces had obviously been used and were full of sawdust. They cleaned up just fine: just a little disappointed that the product was advertised as new and it wasn't.
customer_reviews.author: Richard N.

customer_reviews.title: Buy it, but replace the bearings, if yours drags and clicks, as mine did
customer_reviews.text: As other posters have said, not built/finished the best, but does come in handy. After having used this for a while now, have found that the bearings are not the best, too tight, and induces unnecessary drag on my lathe. Today I pressed the head apart, and found the first bearing you see with the plastic dust cover is the only one that way, the 2(two) Internal bearings are metal shields, they are made in china, and are of poor quality. I replaced the bearings with SKF 6202-2Z/C3QE6, now it spins free, no drag, or bearing click
customer_reviews.author: Leatherneck189

customer_reviews.title: Nova multiple live center system

High quality at a good price: a combination that's hard to beat!

product_meta.title: NOVA 5015 Live Center System with Stepped Cone
product_meta.description:
Style:OLD ModelFROM THE MANUFACTURER
NOVA 5015 Live Center System is a comprehensive tailstock support for virtually all spindle turning requirements. With over 6 handy functions in the one unit, it includes a hollow body for drilling through the center, and replaceable centers including a Threaded Center, 60 Deg Center, Miniature Extension Center, Hollow Cup Center and Stepped Cone. The NOVA 5015 Live Center System can be used on all NOVA lathes and all lathes with a 2MT Tailstock. Its perfect for both heavy and delicate work, and handles both hard and soft woods easily. Included in the product is the Threaded Center: Comes with 3 functions for custom wooden support pieces, a miniature internal cone function for small turnings and an internal support piece for small bowls. 60 Deg Center: Ideal for medium to hard woods and general purpose spindle work. Miniature Extension Center: is used to support thin work for small delicate turnings. The diameter of this stem is 1/4-Inch so can double as a 1/4-Inch pen mandrel. 2 of these centers could be used for each 1/2 of the pen mandrel (available as a separate item for purchase) Hollow Cup Center: is perfect for soft wood support, comes with its own demountable point, with the center point removed hollow boring up to 5/6-Inch can be done. Stepped Cone: for super fast and convenient mounting of work. The NOVA 5015 Live Center System is made to last, with extra tough triple bearing system and precision machined from solid 1045K machine steel for long life and precise fits. Designed by Teknatool International, innovating since 1955. Backed by a full replacement 2-Year warranty.

Versatile, with over 6 functions in the 1 unit
Quick change tapers for super fast mounting of center pieces
Hollow body for drilling through the center
